name: FIRE BOSS LLC
description: Manufacturer of waterborne single engine air tanker float systems and aircraft conversions
sampleDescriptions: Aircraft procurement, contracting issues, product communication and education with USDA/USFS, Department of Interior, Congress, White House, OMB.
This manufacturer of aerial firefighting aircraft seeks to expand its presence within the congress and relevant agencies on behalf of the vendors that purchase its aircraft.
